meico.mpm.elements.styles

Class GenericStyle<E extends AbstractDef>

  • java.lang.Object
    • meico.xml.AbstractXmlSubtree
      • meico.mpm.elements.styles.GenericStyle<E>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ArticulationStyle, DynamicsStyle, MetricalAccentuationStyle, OrnamentationStyle, RubatoStyle, TempoStyle

    public class GenericStyle<E extends AbstractDef>
extends AbstractXmlSubtree
    This class interfaces MPM styleDef elements.
    Author:
    Axel Berndt
